yellow.titleLine2: one small good deed at a time

main.subLine1: With Charry, donation is just a few clicks away.
main.subLine2: Support Estonia’s most trustworthy NGOs, receive visual feedback, and earn rewarding and heartwarming badges for your good deeds.
main.smallLine1: Donations can be made anonymously, and 100%
main.smallLine2: of your donation goes directly to the charities.
main.downloadText: Available on IOS and Android devices.

bottom.usersText: Together we make a huge impact!

friends.title: Our friends
friends.titleText: If you want your trustworthy and well-functioning charity organization to be on the Charry platform, learn more.

main.title: New Charities
main.titleText1: Donor trust is our top priority. That’s why we make sure that every charity organization is reliable and operates effectively before adding it to our platform.
main.titleText2: For us, both proper documentation and a genuine desire to help Estonian society are fundamentally important.
main.bulletpoint1: The Charry team ensures that all processes related to the platform are as convenient and seamless as possible for charity organizations.
main.bulletpoint2: All donations made through the platform are directed immediately and fully to the charity organizations.
main.bulletpoint3: On the Charry platform, charity organizations can easily share (visual) feedback with their donors.
main.smallText: * The Charry team is always ready to assist in creating feedback content, such as taking photos and videos.
main.bulletpoint4: To join the platform, a charity organization must be registered in the list of entities eligible for income tax benefits.

join.title: Become one of our charities
join.titleText: For further instructions please contact us.

main.title: Partner Challenges
main.titleText: We invite all companies to contribute to the development of Estonia’s charity culture by presenting a charitable challenge to Charry donors.
main.bulletpoint1: For completing the challenge, the company rewards donors with its products or services.
main.bulletpoint2: Presenting a challenge is a great way to demonstrate social responsibility of your company and gain visibility for your activities.
main.bulletpoint3: The goal of the challenge is to encourage people to donate.
main.bulletpoint4: The Charry team ensures that the redemption of rewards is fair and secure.

future.title: Future Partners
future.titleText: If your company wishes to contribute to Estonia’s charity culture and present a charitable challenge, get in touch with us.

mission.title: Mission
mission.titleText: We aim to make donating a new social norm. We work to make giving as easy and enjoyable as possible, something you want to do again and again. Together, we can make Estonia a role model in the field of charity.

family.title: Charry family
family.titleText: We are open to new team members. If you feel you can bring value to Charry, get in touch with us.

boss.title: Big Boss
boss.titleText1: Charry is our mascot. A handsome little bird who guides and inspires us every day.
boss.titleText2: And yes, if you’re wondering - he’s a white raven. Not a chick, sparrow, pigeon, or owl.

social.title: Find us on social media
social.titleText: Follow Charry’s life and activities more closely on our social media.
